trait.name: speed
trait.visualizeProcedure:
let this-xcor xcor let this-ycor ycor let this-speed speed let this-heading heading hatch 1 [ set breed sense-cones create-link-from myself [tie] ]
let this-arrowhead out-link-neighbors ask this-arrowhead [ set xcor this-xcor set ycor this-ycor set heading this-heading fd .5 + this-speed / 2 set hidden? true] ask my-out-links [set hidden? true]

library.go: if not any? turtles [ user-message (word "All the prey died out! They either all got caught by the predator or lost energy because they weren't eating the grass.") stop ]

condition.name: any-here?
condition.test: report any? other turtles-here with [ breed = breed-type ]

behavior.name: eat
behavior.commands: if any? other turtles-here with [breed = prey] [ let food one-of turtles-here with [breed = prey] ask food [ if speed = 1 [set total-speed1-caught total-speed1-caught + 1 set total-caught total-caught + 1] if speed = 2 [set total-speed2-caught total-speed2-caught + 1 set total-caught total-caught + 1] if speed = 3 [set total-speed3-caught total-speed3-caught + 1 set total-caught total-caught + 1] if speed = 4 [set total-speed4-caught total-speed4-caught + 1 set total-caught total-caught + 1] if speed = 5 [set total-speed5-caught total-speed5-caught + 1 set total-caught total-caught + 1] if any? out-link-neighbors [ask out-link-neighbors [die]] die]]

behavior.name: have-babies
behavior.commands: ifelse count out-link-neighbors > 0 [ hatch 1 [set age 0 rt random 180 fd 1 set-sense-cone]] [hatch 1 [set age 0 rt random 180 fd 1]

diveIn.reporterCode: hide-turtle setxy mouse-xcor mouse-ycor ;; only show the predator if the mouse pointer is ;; actually inside the view set hidden? not mouse-inside? report mouse-down?
